data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 2, Yuichi Nishimura has awarded Kobe a corner.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 6, Noriaki Fujimoto of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 7, Adailton (Tokyo) gets a yellow card.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Kobe.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In the minute 16, Kobe drive upfield and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 17, Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Kobe takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 21, Tokyo's Adailton is on target but unsuccessful.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Tokyo throw-in in Kobe's half.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 23, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Kyogo Furuhashi hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Kobe!
Goal! Takuya Yasui gives Kobe a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 24, Kyogo Furuhashi instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 28, Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Yuichi Nishimura awards Kobe a goal kick.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
Free kick Tokyo.
Kobe are pushing forward but Kyogo Furuhashi's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 32, Tokyo have a goal kick.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Tokyo!
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 43, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kobe.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kobe.
In the minute 48, In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sergi Samper (Kobe) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
In the minute 49, Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Free kick Tokyo.
Adailton is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
In the minute 50, Great play from Kyosuke Tagawa to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yuichi Nishimura has awarded Tokyo a corner.
In the minute 52, Tokyo's Manato Shinada misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 54, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 55, Takumi Nakamura (Tokyo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Daigo Nishi (Kobe) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 57, Kobe to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Tokyo take a 1-2 lead thanks to Diego Oliveira.
That's a fine assist from Yojiro Takahagi.
In the minute 60, Andres Iniesta is replacing Takuya Yasui for the home team.
Hotaru Yamaguchi (Kobe) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
The away team replace Kyosuke Tagawa with Takuya Uchida.
In the minute 63, Tokyo make their second substitution with Leandro replacing Yojiro Takahagi.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Noevir Stadium.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In the minute 67, Daigo Nishi is booked for the home team.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
In the minute 72, Keijiro Ogawa is on a sub for Ryo Hatsuse for Kobe.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a Kobe throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Kobe needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 75, Taichi Hara is on a sub for Adailton for Tokyo.
Kyogo Furuhashi (Kobe) gets a yellow card.
Tokyo are coming forward and Leandro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Goal kick for Kobe at Noevir Stadium.
The home team replace Sergi Samper with Yuta Goke.
In the minute 81, Tokyo drives forward and Leandro gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Kobe make their fourth substitution with So Fujitani replacing Daigo Nishi.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In Kobe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 85, Tokyo will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Kobe.
Andres Iniesta of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kobe.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuichi Nishimura awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Kobe.
Free kick Kobe.
Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Noevir Stadium.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
That's full-time at Noevir Stadium. The final score is 2-2.
Rei Hirakawa is replacing Diego Oliveira for the away team.
At Noevir Stadium, Noriaki Fujimoto has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Dankler equalizes with a header to make it 2-2.
Andres Iniesta with an assist there.
